text:
Hi all,
I am unable to sync the deals in custom pipeline however same code is working for inbuilt stages of <http://pipeline.Is|pipeline.Is> it even possible to sync the deals of ecommerce bridge inside custom made deals pipeline?
Attaching my ss and code .please check and let me know if i am doing anything wrong!
Thanks!
<@U01NLJDQM8V> You'll want to delete those images as you've exposed your API key :grimacing:
oh thanks for pointing it out!

<@U01NLJDQM8V> No problem, and to answer your question, I don't think you can sync Deals via Ecommerce Bridge to a different pipeline (as far as I know). You should be able to customise the deal stages within the auto-created Ecommerce pipeline, and you can create multiple e-commerce stores. I think that's as far as you can go with customisation of stores/pipelines/stages with Ecommerce Bridge.
<@U010M6T8DEW> thats what i think too. thanks once again . :slightly_smiling_face:

<@U010M6T8DEW> we are pushing data in ecommerce pipeline and created two custom stages(Hold and Refund). now want to push data into Hold and Refund stage but couldnt push the data.
i have asked about custom pipeline .. but wanted to know if we can push data inside custom stage of ecommerce pipeline . could you please clear me about this?
thanks!
<@U01NLJDQM8V> I'd first like to confirm that you've mapped your property names using upsert e-commerce settings endpoint: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/ecommerce/v2/upsert-settings>
